name: rubya
description: Project destined to create json schema of visual form in vue.js

scripts.build: rm -Rf dist && npm run dist:umd & npm run dist:cjs & npm run dist:unpkg
scripts.dist:umd: poi build ./src/rubya.js --format umd --module-name Rubya --filename.js rubya.umd.js --filename.css rubya.css --no-sourceMap --no-html
scripts.dist:cjs: poi build ./src/rubya.js --format cjs --module-name Rubya --filename.js rubya.cjs.js --filename.css rubya.css --no-sourceMap --no-html
scripts.dist:unpkg: poi build ./src/rubya.js --format iife --module-name Rubya --filename.js rubya.min.js --filename.css rubya.css --no-sourceMap --no-html

author: Arnaldo Bertoni <arnaldo.bertoni@ufabc.edu.br>
